trends: There have been 136 other sightings in Toronto
There were no other sightings in Toronto on or around September 18th 2005
Summary: A flash of white light that expanded very evenly before contracting to a dot that kept moving at an even speed and faded
divs: sighting detailsi was in the yard lying on a sleeping bag. i had been trying to astrally project but did mostly meditation. while lying down i did wish to see a ufo about 10 min before the event. i was lying on my side and looking into a sleeping bag and then instinctively i looked over my left shoulder at the sky. and there was a gentle miracle magically growing to a bright solid white energy mass. it expanded and shrank uniformly to a point that faded with a crisp snap. i felt reassurance and gladness. there is no multimedia attachments but there is a poll about mushrooms at: http:\\www.metajournal.net\_sophias_tongue_\2005\9\18\20\
